meanings.definition: The ability to do something or act in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: His power to lift heavy objects amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The king's power over his kingdom was unquestionable.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power to fly made commuting a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The power of teamwork can achieve great things.
meanings.sent5: The power of positive thinking can change your life.

meanings.definition: Control or influence over others or a situation.
meanings.sent1: She used her power to convince others to join the cause.
meanings.sent2: The dictator's power was feared by all citizens.
meanings.sent3: The power of persuasion can make even a cat walk on a leash.
meanings.sent4: The power of love can conquer all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The power of a smile can brighten someone's day.

meanings.definition: Energy or force that is produced or used.
meanings.sent1: The solar panels generate power for the entire building.
meanings.sent2: The wind turbines harness the power of the wind to create electricity.
meanings.sent3: The power outage left everyone in the dark, literally.
meanings.sent4: The power of nature can be both beautiful and destructive.
meanings.sent5: The power of a waterfall is mesmerizing to behold.
